description: Try our easy to follow Turkish Pizza with Avocado Tzatziki recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Turkish Pizza with Avocado Tzatziki Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the pide on a large serving platter. Top with avocado tzatziki and serve immediately.
